item.title: HUB3: Streetfood-inspirerede tacos med krydret kylling, frisklavet tomatsalsa, sprød kål, saltet creme fraiche-dressing og et drys koriander – Men kun til dem der tør. | | MONDAY | Sweet and sour chicken with rice and crispy seasonal vegetables. A well-balanced dish with a tangy and sweet sauce that captures both warmth and freshness. | TUESDAY | Hungarian goulash soup with tender, slow-braised beef chuck from Himmerland, caramelised pearl onions, mushrooms, and flat-leaf parsley. A warm classic with depth and richness. | WEDNESDAY | Creamy Cacio e Pepe – an Italian pasta favourite with freshly grated Parmesan, plenty of black pepper, and a hint of soft oregano. Simple, yet full of flavour. | Today’s cake: Banana cake with chunks of dark chocolate. | THURSDAY | Traditional Danish medister sausages with braised cabbage, small boiled potatoes, pickled cucumber slices, and a mild mustard sauce. | FRIDAY | Street food–inspired tacos with spicy chicken, fresh tomato salsa, crunchy cabbage, salted crème fraîche dressing, and a sprinkle of coriander – but only for the brave. | Vegetar : Sur/sød broccoli og tofu i samme aromatiske sauce, serveret med ris og sprøde grøntsager. | Vegetar : Samme fyldige gullaschsuppe, uden kød, men med fokus på de smagfulde svampe, rodfrugter, perleløg og urter. | Vegetar : Grillet vegetarpølse i klassisk selskab med brunkål, kartofler, asier og sennepssauce. | Vegetar: Samme tacos med spicy bønner og samme tilbehør – fuld af smag og tekstur. | Vegetarian : Sweet and sour broccoli and tofu in the same aromatic sauce, served with rice and crispy vegetables. | Vegetarian : The same hearty goulash soup, without meat – focusing on flavourful mushrooms, root vegetables, pearl onions, and fresh herbs. | Vegetarian : Grilled vegetarian sausage served with classic sides – braised cabbage, potatoes, pickles, and mustard sauce. | Vegetarian : The same tacos with spicy beans and all the same toppings – packed with flavour and texture.
item.description: HUB3: Streetfood-inspirerede tacos med krydret kylling, frisklavet tomatsalsa, sprød kål, saltet creme fraiche-dressing og et drys koriander – Men kun til dem der tør. | | MONDAY | Sweet and sour chicken with rice and crispy seasonal vegetables. A well-balanced dish with a tangy and sweet sauce that captures both warmth and freshness. | TUESDAY | Hungarian goulash soup with tender, slow-braised beef chuck from Himmerland, caramelised pearl onions, mushrooms, and flat-leaf parsley. A warm classic with depth and richness. | WEDNESDAY | Creamy Cacio e Pepe – an Italian pasta favourite with freshly grated Parmesan, plenty of black pepper, and a hint of soft oregano. Simple, yet full of flavour. | Today’s cake: Banana cake with chunks of dark chocolate. | THURSDAY | Traditional Danish medister sausages with braised cabbage, small boiled potatoes, pickled cucumber slices, and a mild mustard sauce. | FRIDAY | Street food–inspired tacos with spicy chicken, fresh tomato salsa, crunchy cabbage, salted crème fraîche dressing, and a sprinkle of coriander – but only for the brave. | Vegetar : Sur/sød broccoli og tofu i samme aromatiske sauce, serveret med ris og sprøde grøntsager. | Vegetar : Samme fyldige gullaschsuppe, uden kød, men med fokus på de smagfulde svampe, rodfrugter, perleløg og urter. | Vegetar : Grillet vegetarpølse i klassisk selskab med brunkål, kartofler, asier og sennepssauce. | Vegetar: Samme tacos med spicy bønner og samme tilbehør – fuld af smag og tekstur. | Vegetarian : Sweet and sour broccoli and tofu in the same aromatic sauce, served with rice and crispy vegetables. | Vegetarian : The same hearty goulash soup, without meat – focusing on flavourful mushrooms, root vegetables, pearl onions, and fresh herbs. | Vegetarian : Grilled vegetarian sausage served with classic sides – braised cabbage, potatoes, pickles, and mustard sauce. | Vegetarian : The same tacos with spicy beans and all the same toppings – packed with flavour and texture.
